text: Indian religions or Indic religions are religions that originated from the Indian subcontinent. Dharma is an idea common to many of these religions. == List of Indian religions == === Dharmic religions === The following religions are based on the ideology of Dharma: *Buddhism *Hinduism *Jainism *Sikhism === Ethnic/folk religions === The following religions are not necessarily based on the concept of Dharma and have their own ideologies: *Sanamahism *Donyi Poloism *Bathouism *Sarnaism Category:Indian religions
title: Indian religions
